title: The Original
text:
Other one-size-fits-all pillows don’t provide the comfort or support needed for a good night’s rest since each person has a different body type, sleep position, and unique needs. We’ve designed our pillow to be fully adjustable to complement each person’s needs for the best sleep ever.

Although there may be other "adjustable" pillows out there, those tend to just come in different fill levels and don't allow for actual adjustability. Our pillow is fully adjustable in that you can add, remove, and shape the fill to suit your size and sleep position(s). This allows for much more customization to suit each person's unique needs.

Most importantly, we use brand new memory foam, not leftover scraps like many other companies. The memory foam in our pillows is CertiPUR-US® certified to ensure safety and quality. Additionally, the Original Pillow has achieved GREENGUARD [GOLD] Certification. GREENGUARD Certified products are certified to GREENGUARD standards for low chemical emissions into indoor air during product usage. For more information, visit ul.com/gg
description: Our medium firm pillow. Cross-cut microfiber and memory foam fill. Fully adjustable to your body and sleep position.
